amendment.description: To increase funding for COPS, Byre grants, and Local Law Enforcement Block Grants, and reduce tax breaks for certain individuals.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2793 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 41 - 55. Record Vote Number: 44.

action.text: Amendment SA 2793 proposed by Senator Dorgan. (consideration: CR S2611-2620, S2643-2644, CR 3/12/2004 S2687; text: CR S2611) To increase funding for COPS, Byre grants, and Local Law Enforcement Block Grants, and reduce tax breaks for certain individuals.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2793 proposed by Senator Dorgan.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 2793 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 41 - 55. Record Vote Number: 44.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 2793 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 41 - 55. Record Vote Number: 44.
